name: @reggieofarrell/axios-retry-client
description: A generic and extendable REST API client based on axios with retry, written in TypeScript
author: Reggie O'Farrell

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && rollup -c
scripts.deploy:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.deploy:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
